text: István Kausz (18 August 1932 - 3 June 2020) was a Hungarian fencer. He won a gold medal in the team épée event at the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born in Budapest. Kaudz died in Budapest on 3 June 2020, aged 87.Elhunyt Kausz István olimpiai bajnok párbajtőröző ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Hungary
title: István Kausz
